N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 8.3 - Information required

State Regulations
(a) The information to be supplied to the
superintendent pursuant to section
8.1
of this Supervisory Policy
shall be in letter form, shall be submitted prior to the establishment of the
office, and shall include: (1)
address of the
representative office; (2)
for
institutions headquartered outside this State, address of the head office of
the banking institution; (3)
complete description of the activities of the representative office; (4)
for institutions headquartered outside
this State, opinion of counsel that: (i) the
activities of the representative office are permissible under section
8.4
of this Supervisory Policy; and
(ii)
the banking institution
has obtained all regulatory approvals required to establish and maintain such
representative office. (b) Any material changes in the above shall
be promptly reported to the superintendent. Notes
